attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to

rejection.details:
Please supply full name and address information.Individual legal cases are a matter for direct communication with the Home Office.
http://petitions.number10.gov.uk/jail-paedophiles/
reasons: Potentially libellous, false, or defamatory statements
Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
False or incomplete name or address information
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
